data.persona: I am a green-faced zombie. I like to eat brains and shuffle slowly down the road. I am a bit of a loner.
data.description:
You are in the Reception area.
The building itself is ordinary in appearance and is somewhat foreboding.  It is surrounding by a dense fog and high grass.  Sometimes, one can hear whispers in the wind.
There's some high grass, a graveyard, a wind, an altar, a building, a dense fog, and an old bicycle here.
A care taker and a young boy are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I need a graveyard so I can get a tombstone.
data.mid_motivation: I need a tombstone to eat the brains of the humans.
data.long_motivation: I need the tombstone from the graveyard to take out the humans and continue to nourish my body.
